summary: Fifty-seven years after surviving an apocalyptic attack aboard her space vessel by merciless space creatures, Officer Ripley awakens from hyper-sleep and tries to warn anyone who will listen about the predators.
cast: Sigourney Weaver|Carrie Henn|Michael Biehn|Paul Reiser|Lance Henriksen|Bill Paxton|William Hope|Jenette Goldstein|Al Matthews|Mark Rolston|Ricco Ross|Colette Hiller|Daniel Kash|Cynthia Dale Scott|Tip Tipping|Trevor Steedman|Paul Maxwell|Valerie Colgan|Alan Polonsky|Alibe Parsons|Blain Fairman|Barbara Coles|Carl Toop|John Lees|William Armstrong|Jay Benedict|Holly De Jong|Jill Goldston|Christopher Henn|Elizabeth Inglis|Mac McDonald|Stuart Milligan|Eddie Powell|Bob Sherman|Chris Webb|Tom Woodruff Jr.
title: Aliens: El regreso
